headline: Array, Quest Resource, Gibraltar, FTAI Infrastructure, and Sunrun Shares Are Soaring, What You Need To Know
summary: A number of stocks jumped in the afternoon session after the US president announced a framework for a future deal with Greenland. Wall Street saw a broad-based rally, with the S&P 500 gaining 1.2% as investor concerns over global trade tensions eased. The positive sentiment followed an announcement that reversed course on plans to impose tariffs linked to Greenland, which had caused steep market losses earlier in the week.
